The source of the wage figure was data a: 3. The wage figure was obtained by comparing the combined wages for specific time periods before and after Kasich took office, specifically the third and fourth quarters of 2010 and the first and second quarters of 2011 against the third and fourth quarters of 2011 and the first and second quarters of 2012.
Per capita income in Ohio increased by 4: 5 percent in 2011, according to the U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis.
